program: Master of Science in Computer Science

toefl.notes: Must score at least 100 on the iBT with a minimum of 19 in each section.

gre.notes: GRE is required for all MSCS applicants. Strong quantitative scores are expected.

description_for_vector_db: [Program Breadth] Georgia Tech's MSCS offers 11 distinct specializations, including Computing Systems, Machine Learning, and Interactive Computing. [Flexibility] Students can choose between three options: Coursework-only, Project, or Thesis. [Career Powerhouse] Known as one of the best ROI (Return on Investment) programs, GT graduates are heavily recruited by top-tier tech companies globally. [Admission Insight] Competitive applicants typically have a GPA of 3.5 or higher and significant technical projects or internship experience.
